summary: Cheated Dark Elf and Breton females. Dark Elf now also has NON-CHEATED files available.
descriptionHtml:
****UPDATE****
-Iris the Dark Elf now includes added non-cheated saves along side her cheated file. The additional two saves start in Helgen\'s Keep with either Ralof or Hadvar. Read the readme in the rar file to see which is which.

-Jaidah has been added
_________________________________________________________________________________________
JAIDAH:

Jaidah the Wood Elf has now been added. She starts in Helgen\'s Keep with either Hadvar or Ralof. There are 4 saves included. 2 NON-CHEATED and 2 CHEATED. Check the readme included to know what each save is. 
*****IMPORTANT*****
As with Jaidah, you will need the elf mods like Iris does. Links are below under Iris\' description.

CHEATED STATS:
----------------
Health: 900
Magicka: 900
Stamina: 900
Level: 100
Carry Weight: 1000
Gold: 9999999

SKILLS: All skills are maxed and all perks unlocked

SHOUTS: All shouts unlocked and ready for use + no cool down time

SPELLS: All spells are learned

BONUSES INCLUDED IN CHEATED FILES:
-Player is given full daedric armor set
-Player is given all daedric weapons including 2 of every one-handed weapon for dual wielders and 10,000 daedric arrows
-Player is given full dragon bone armor set
-Player is given full dragon scale armor set
_________________________________________________________________________________________
Cheated Breton Maridith.

She is a maxed mage character. The save has you right outside the College of Winterhold. Talk to the woman right next to you to get the tour of the college and and begins the quests for them. The main story has NOT been touched. All map markers are shown and can be fast-traveled to.

STATS:
Health: 780
Magicka: 1000
Stamina: 900
Carry Weight: 1000
Level: 100

SKILLS: All skills have all perk trees completed and all mage type skills are at 100. The rest are default.

SPELLS: ALL spells are known

SHOUTS: All shouts are known + no cool down times

_________________________________________________________________________________________
Cheated Dark Elf female. Named Iris.

This save is right after collecting the dragonstone so you didn\'t miss your first dragon fight. You will be in the dark brotherhood and only 1 main quest has been done for it. You are also married to Muiri and the house is the Hag\'s Cure shop found in Markarth. You are also in the Imperial Legion army and have just completed the quest to retrieve the Jagged Crown so you\'re still in the very beginning. Stats are as follows below.

***IMPORTANT****
In order to have Iris looking as she does in the screenshot you MUST have these mods installed. THEY ARE NOT REQUIRED BUT WITHOUT THEM IRIS WILL LOOK VERY DIFFERENT!
Less Ugly Elven Faces by Arlekin: http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=29
Detailed Faces v2 by Xenius: http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=26
Detailed Bodies by Xenius: http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=256
Human eyes for Elves by Porcelyn: http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=195
High Quality Eyes by Xenius: http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=498

***REMEMBER THIS CHARACTER WAS CHEATED USING THE CONSOLE***
STATS:
Magicka: 900
Stamina: 900
Health: 790
Max Carry Weight: 1000
Level: 100
Dragon Souls: 91

SKILLS:
Alchemy: 100 + ALL PERKS
Enchanting: 100 + ALL PERKS
Smithing: 100 + ALL PERKS
Archery: 100 + ALL PERKS
One-Handed: 100 + ALL PERKS
Two-Handed: 100 + ALL PERKS
Blocking: 100 + ALL PERKS
Heavy Armor: 100 + ALL PERKS
Light Armor: 100 + ALL PERKS
Pickpocketing: 100 + ALL PERKS
Lockpicking: 100 + ALL PERKS
Sneak: 100 + ALL PERKS
Illusion:  100 + ALL PERKS
Alteration: 100 + ALL PERKS
Conjuration: 100 + ALL PERKS
Restoration: 100 + ALL PERKS
Destruction: 100 + ALL PERKS
Speech: 100 + ALL PERKS

SHOUTS: All shouts are there but only Unrelenting Force, Whirlwind Sprint and Ice Form are usable. You must spend the 91 dragon souls on the other shouts if you want them.

SPELLS: All spells are known

EQUIPMENT: Imperial legion heavy armor, ebony shield and ebony sword. All upgraded to LEGENDARY.
author: TKHawke
